articles.author: The Globe and Mail
articles.title: What the Trump assault on American democracy has taught us
articles.description: It would be wise to renew our faith in the three pillars – democracy, alliances, trade – that he seems determined to destroy
articles.content:
In a way, Donald Trump has taught us a valuable lesson.
His assault on American democracy has shown how fragile and precious democratic institutions are. His contempt for our system of alliances has shown us how vulnerable we would be if that shield ... [3555 chars]

articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Majority of voters describe Trump’s second term as ‘chaotic’ and ‘scary,’ new poll reveals
articles.description: More than half of voters described President Trump’s second term in office as “chaotic” and “scary” in a new poll released Friday.
articles.content:
More than half of voters described President Trump’s second term in office as “chaotic” and “scary” in a new poll released Friday.

articles.title: Trump says Russia, Ukraine 'very close to a deal'
articles.description: US President Donald Trump's envoy Steve Witkoff met Russian President Vladimir Putin for three hours in Russia yesterday to discuss the US plan to end the war in Ukraine, and Mr Trump said the two sides were "very close to a deal," despite apparent differences in their positions.
